question: Which state launched Gyankunj Project in schools recently?
explanation: Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani has launched "Gyakunj e-class project" from Shahpur primary school in Gandhinagar. Under this initiative, interactive e-class will be launched with smart board, in the first phase, 550 schools will be covered under the 'Gyankunj Project' and gradually standard 5th to 9th of every schools of the state will cover under the project. The objective of the project is to produce world-class students. The project is launched at expenditure of Rs. 222,000/- per school.
